Submit an overseas, historic, or not-done vaccination to AIRQuestionnairehttps://build.fhir.org/ig/tewhatuora/cinc-fhir-ig/Questionnaire/ImmsotVaccinationDataEntryQuestionnaire#0.4.1
p01-Immunisationpage 1. Page 10..1group
p01-q01-Typepage 1 question 1. Type of vaccination1..1choiceOptions: 3 options

Enable When:

  • p01-q01-Type =

Initial Value: string = completed

Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
Initial Value: string = not-done

Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
Initial Value: Coding = air-status-reason-terms#GIVNOS "Given overseas"

Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
Initial Value: Coding = air-status-reason-terms#HSTGIVN "Given historically"
p01-q06-StatusReasonNotDonepage 1 question 6. Status reason1..1choiceDefinition: Immunization.statusReason.coding[]
Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
Options: 4 options

Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
Initial Value: Coding = [not stated]#F3R789-A "NIR Overseas Clinic"
p01-q08-FacilityHistoricpage 1 question 8. Extract - Historic facility0..1choiceDefinition: Immunization.location
Enable When:
  • p01-q01-Type =
  • p01-q01-Type =

Initial Value: Coding = [not stated]#F3R790-H "NIR Unknown NZ Clinic"
p01-q09-Antigenspage 1 question 9. Vaccine antigens1..1choiceDefinition: Immunization.vaccineCode.coding[]
Enable When: p01-q01-Type exists
Options: 82 options

Enable When:
  • p01-q01-Type =
  • p01-q01-Type =
p01-q11-DoseNumberpage 1 question 11. Dose number1..1integerDefinition: Immunization.protocolApplied[].doseNumberPositiveInt
Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
p01-q12-Indicationpage 1 question 12. Indication (reason code)1..1choiceDefinition: Immunization.reasonCode[].coding[]
Enable When: p01-q01-Type exists
Options: 33 options

Enable When:
  • p01-q01-Type =
  • p01-q01-Type =
p01-q14-DateNotDonepage 1 question 14. Date vaccine determined as not done1..1dateDefinition: Immunization.occurrenceDateTime
Enable When: p01-q01-Type =
p01-q15-SubjectMetapage 1 question 15. null0..1booleanInitial Value: boolean = true

Documentation for this format
